author: calixtorontocalix
title: Cardano Creatives
description: How can we bridge the divide between Cardano's developer community & an emerging creative community to capture untapped opportunities?
importance: Exponential growth of Catalyst requires a dedicated community for creatives to develop, refine & release proposals to the Cardano community.
success: Catalyst members proposing within the Cardano Creatives Challenge for Fund 8 and beyond, to begin building out this untapped category.
